name: Publicly Accessible Alibaba ApsaraDB Instances
query: { dbInstances( where: { cloudProvider: "alibaba" netInfo_SOME: { ipType: "Public" } whitelist: { rules_SOME: { direction: "Inbound", sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } } ) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
